NATIONAL ASSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
NAEB
OFFICE OF EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR
14 GREGORY HALL
URBANA, ILLINOIS
February 24, 1958
Dr. Sam Becker
Director, Division of
Television and Radio
State University of Iowa
Iowa City, Iowa
Dear Sam:
Attached is the Thayer study, just returned by Ken Harwood, and
WOUB’s report submitted by Archie M. Greer. I’m having diffi¬
culty locating some of the other reports, or I’d send others on to
you.
Our best in haste
Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
